Belong
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Library: Fan Fiction, Poetry, Birthday List, Links & Non-Fiction Archive: Poetry: Belong
By Kalus on Thursday, July 8, 2004 - 07:51 pm:

You make me feel like I belong
I never thought I would feel this way
For some reason it feels wrong
Probably because I have never felt it until today
Maybe this feeling is love
Maybe it is not

It feels like I have been shot, I begin to reel
Wondering if you feel the same way
Please tell me how you feel
I don't want to feel this everyday
Wondering if I'm doomed to be alone
Hoping you feel the same

By Da_Mullet on Thursday, July 8, 2004 - 09:12 pm:

By Infernus on Thursday, July 8, 2004 - 09:22 pm:

I'm a poet. It's good, and definately has its improvements over your other ones. It has a happy/sad twist, which is nice. I couldn't quite get into the rythm of it, but then, can anyone but the other truly do that?

By Kalus on Saturday, July 10, 2004 - 08:44 pm:

Thanks, I just hope the girl I wrote it about thinks the same thing, I put a lot of feelings into this poem, glad other people like it.

By Infernus on Sunday, July 11, 2004 - 06:48 pm:

can anyone but the other truly do that?

By Kalus on Monday, July 12, 2004 - 12:30 am:
